title: Valid S/MIME signature not showing
content:
I have a valid x.509 certificate and am able to send S/MIME signed emails via Thunderbird 128.5.1esr (64-bit) [Windows 10.0.22631.4460).

The private key is stored on a Yubikey. However, the certifying authorities are in the Thunderbird Authorities.

I can send S/MIME signed emails.

Viewing the received email in Gmail (web) correctly shows that email is signed, verified by a known issuer, and provides links to the certificates.

Viewing the same received email in Thunderbird only shows the S/MIME badge/icon when the Yubikey is connected.

Is this intentional behavior? Why doesn't Thunderbird show the S/MIME badge?
creator: mental-tarsus02

title: Technical help/IT help with Thunderbird
content: I worked with an IT guy to help me transfer information from Carbonite back to Thunderbird. I can see all the files download to my computer but can't get them and the address book to update. Does anyone know someone who specializes in helping people with Thunderbird issues?

title: How to stop Thunderbird from forwarding email to Gmail
content: I have an email account with Spectrum. Recently, I linked my Thunderbird client (128.5.5 esr 64-bit) with Gmail and now find that my Thunderbird inbox has been completely put under the control of Gmail. Email still arrives at the Thunderbird Inbox but, if not acted on quickly, is removed to my Gmail account, leaving the Inbox empty. It is also removed from the Spectrum server. I spoke with Spectrum and they confirmed that they are not forwarding the email and that the solution to the problem is with the settings in Thunderbird or Gmail. I would like to stop all forwarding of my email from Thunderbird to Gmail. I’ve looked hard but not been able to find anyway to do this either in Gmail or Thunderbird. Please advise. Thank you.
creator: sschreib

title: Mail attachments disappear
content:

title: Issues with Thunderbird Installation and Updates
content:
Hi everyone,

I’m having some trouble with Thunderbird and could use some guidance. I’ve been trying to install the latest version, but I keep running into issues. The installation either fails midway or gives an error message I can’t figure out.

Also, for the times when I’ve managed to install Thunderbird, I’ve noticed that updates don’t seem to apply properly. The program either doesn’t update automatically or prompts me to download the full installer again.

Could someone explain the proper steps for installing Thunderbird and ensuring updates are applied correctly? Are there any common pitfalls or settings I should check to avoid these issues?

Any help would be greatly appreciated!

Thanks!

title: Thunderbird shows inconsistent subject and addressee in the Drafts folder
content: I just read the thread "Thunderbird does not delete save drafts after email is sent", cause i experience this since years and do not understand the rationale, why auto-saved drafts do not disappear from the drafts folder, when the mail is sent. Then it should be in the folder Sent and nowhere else anymore. Anyway. Another thing i see and that more than confused me, when i got aware of it the first times, is, that for the mails in the drafts folder, the shown correspondent does not match the mail. When i click the mail in question in the list, i see a mail matching the subject and in the reading pane showing the correct addressee, but in the list it seems thunderbird shows a random addressee from one of the mails sent recently. I have several Linux installations with several users and the issue appears on all of them. Thank you for fixing or deeper insight, what the use of this might be.
creator: albert.fluegel

title: Certificato del peer è stato revocato. Pec non vengono inviate.
content: Buongiorno. Da questa mattina un mio collega ed io abbiamo problemi ad inviare messaggi di posta elettronica certificata con Thunderbird. Il gestore è, per entrambi, Namirial sicurezza postale e ad entrambi Thunderbird restituisce il seguente messaggio "Invio del messaggio non riuscito. Il certificato del peer è stato revocato. La configurazione relativa a smtps.sicurezzapostale.it deve essere corretta". In entrata non ci sono problemi. Non so esattamente quali modifiche dovrei apportare per risolvere il problema. Vi ringrazio sin d'ora per l'aiuto. Luisa

title: Paramètres Orange Obsolètes
content: Bonjour, depuis la MAJ du 3/12/2024, je ne reçois plus les mails de mon compte orange, sans être intervenue. J'ai un message indiquant que la connexion serveur Orange a été réinitialisée (pj). J'ai contacté le Service Clients Orange qui m'indique qu'il n'y a aucune anomalie et que rien n'empêche de recevoir sur Thunderbird des mails de mon compte Orange.
